about_the_game:
【 Game Features 】

Arts of this game are all by hand-drawn action pictures, Let you experience general game fighting and gorgeous combat pleasure.
The game uses a new and more intuitively keyboard operation, It’s not need more effort to memorize, no practice costs, each move can be easily performed, let your fingers into fists and feet, Go and play with the “storm” of attacks.


You can switch two different transformations for battle. You can burn “power of life”, get a powerful force like the wind, so that you can also through the Fluently operation, restore the vitality, so as to reverse the situation in one stroke, you will be able to find your favorite way to fight, and to face a variety of enemies with different abilities.

When the health point is zero, it may be a beginning of the fight...

Rich characters, exquisite painting, Immersive storytelling. Feel the joys and sorrows of ordinary people, and pain and persistence, kindness and sincerity, and the love of life till die.

【 Game story 】

An incredible teenager born in the sea of humanity by people's encounter and separation, accidentally joined the down-and-out street band - Heaven and Earth band. Subsequently, because of the acquaintance with the social youth Xie Jindong, he was accidentally involved in a series of disputes, and in the process witnessed the struggle in his life and the firelight held in his hand...

Two mysterious organizations that have been dormant in society since do not know when, and their long feud entanglements behind them, also gradually surfaced at the end of the story...

name: Desperate 1: After Sunset

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: intel i5-6500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows7+
  • Processor: intel i7-9700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2060 / Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The first work of the "Desperate" series - After Sunset, it’s a horizontal 2D action game with hand-painted, and using a new keyboard operation, you can feel a more intuitive combat experience in this game. Fight for the thing you loved in your life in every street you pass by！

English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
